title: Bug 18705 - Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: Excessive flashing occurs within the Control Example for an unknown reason.
OB: When interacting with the Control Example, there is frequent and unnecessary flashing or flickering across the entire interface, particularly noticeable when navigating between frames or elements.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames needs to be repainted, minimizing unnecessary flashing during user interactions.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Interact with various frames, buttons, or elements within the interface.
3. Observe the excessive flashing occurring across the interface during these interactions.
